data.text: @Kristytipsy @kat_ex_machina My boyfriend’s work is lifting their mask mandate when Oregon does on Saturday. 😒
@kat_ex_machina Yeah basically. Are they keeping masking at least? We aren’t back in and masking is here to stay for a while at least.

@Kristytipsy Found this article so annoying. "They've probably been vigilant with masking, vaccines, and isolation, and also lucky." Great! So now I go back to the office next week and work an Oscars event as precautions fall like dominoes & no longer get to remain "lucky" to have not had it.
@Kristytipsy @jenmacramos It *must* be because God loves us ultra-liberal atheists.
@jenmacramos Science can’t explain it! My cousins who are partying in crowded casinos also can’t understand it.
The question mark with the spike protein is wild.
@Kristytipsy wow it's like preventive measures are actually ... preventive??? THERE'S NO WAY THIS IS POSSIBLE
We have only recently resumed occasional outdoor dining at restaurants. The very few instances of indoor dining is in an empty, well ventilated area.
